<small>Hebrew form: [[H1359]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גֹּב‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==pit, den of lions== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גּוּב‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pit***;? compare Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֹּב‎</span> proper name, of a location, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גבב‎</span>); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ג‎</span> [[Dan.6.8|Dan 6:8]]; [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גּוֺב‎</span> v.[[Dan.6.13|Dan 6:13]] emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גֻּבָּא‎</span> v.[[Dan.6.17|Dan 6:17]] v.[[Dan.6.18|Dan 6:18]] v.[[Dan.6.20|Dan 6:20]] v.[[Dan.6.21|Dan 6:21]] v.[[Dan.6.24|Dan 6:24]] v.[[Dan.6.24|Dan 6:24]] v.[[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]].
